00020 #ifndef PIXELFORMAT_H_
00021 #define PIXELFORMAT_H_
00022 #include <com/xuggle/xuggler/Xuggler.h>
00023 #include <com/xuggle/xuggler/IPixelFormat.h>
00024 
00025 namespace com { namespace xuggle { namespace xuggler
00026 {
00027   class PixelFormat : public IPixelFormat {
00028   public:
00029 #ifndef SWIG
00030     /*
00031      * Inline version of prior function that does the same thing, but has no error
00032      * checking.
00033      * 
00034      * This code is very tricky; it relies on /2 shaving off odd digits.
00035      * 
00036      */
00037     static int getFastYUV420PPixelOffset(int width, int height,
00038         int x, int y,
00039         IPixelFormat::YUVColorComponent c)
00040     {
00041       int retval = 0;
00042       switch(c)
00043       {
00044         case IPixelFormat::YUV_Y:
00045         {
00046           retval = y*width+x;
00047         }
00048         break;
00049         case IPixelFormat::YUV_U:
00050         {
00051           int area = width*height;
00052           int w2 = (width+1)>>1;
00053           retval = (y>>1)*w2+(x>>1)+area;
00054         }
00055         break;
00056         case IPixelFormat::YUV_V:
00057         {
00058           int area = width*height;
00059           int w2 = (width+1)>>1;
00060           int h2 = (height+1)>>1;
00061           int area2 = w2*h2;
00062           retval = (y>>1)*w2+(x>>1)+area+area2;
00063         }
00064         break;
00065       }
00066       return retval;
00067     }
00068 #endif
00069   };
00070 }}}
00071 #endif // ! PIXELFORMAT_H_
